books.name: Accelerate: The Science of Lean Software and DevOps: Building and Scaling High Performing Technology Organizations
books.author: Nicole Forsgren, PhD, Jez Humble, Gene Kim

podcasts.name: SE Radio
podcasts.description: Weekly podcast by IEEE Computer Society and IEEE Software magazine covering various topics about software engineering.

podcasts.name: Frontend Happy Hour
podcasts.description: A podcast on software engineering showcasing a panel of professionals from Netflix, Twitch, and Atlassian engaging in relaxed conversations over beverages, covering topics such as frontend development, JavaScript, and career growth.

podcasts.name: Manager's tools
podcasts.description: Manager Tools podcasts cater to managers and directors, while Career Tools offers beneficial insights for individuals at any stage of their career journey.

sites.name: CSS Tricks
sites.description: One of the resource for tips, tricks, and techniques on using Cascading Style Sheets.

sites.name: MDN Web Docs
sites.description: The MDN Web Docs website offers details on Open Web technologies such as HTML, CSS, and APIs, applicable to both websites and progressive web applications (PWAs).

sites.name: Dev.to
sites.description: A community for coders share, stay up-to-date and grow their careers.

sites.name: Web.dev
sites.description: The content on Web.dev is authored by members of the Chrome team and external experts. It aims to assist you in building visually appealing, user-friendly, and secure websites that function seamlessly across different browsers.

sites.name: Leaddev
sites.description: Gain valuable insights into effective engineering management and leadership through comprehensive articles, events, and workshops.

sites.name: Martin Fowler
sites.description: Author of the famous book "Refactoring", Martin Fowler's website has numerous articles on building software effectively.

sites.name: Troy Hunt
sites.description: Creator of the websites Have I Been Pwned?, Troy hunt is an international speaker on information security.

sites.name: Coursera
sites.description: A platform that offers courses covering a wide variety of tech and non-tech topics.

sites.name: Monorepo
sites.description: Everything you need to know about monorepos, and the tools to build them.
